bibl.title: The Pact between the Kings, Polybius 15.20.6, and Polybius' View of the Outbreak of the Second Macedonian War.
bibl.note: The embassies from Egypt, Pergamon, Rhodes, and Athens to Rome in 201/200 B.C. and the pact between Philip V of Macedon and Antiochus III of Syria to dismember the Ptolemaic empire, struck circa winter 203/202 B.C.
ECKSTEIN A.M., The Pact between the Kings, Polybius 15.20.6, and Polybius' View of the Outbreak of the Second Macedonian War.
